* A utility class that wraps the ThreadController, which is used
 * by IncrementalSAXSource for the incremental building of DTM.

methods.name: public static Thread runThread(Runnable runnable, int priority)
public static void waitThread(Thread worker, Runnable task) throws InterruptedException
